document.full_text: blip.tv, a video site that specializes in web-created shows, introduced a newly designed site on tuesday that hopes to highlight its best video content.
document.title: blip.tv reintroduces itself as a curated video site
lines_and_colors: blip.tv, a video site that specializes in web-created shows, introduced a newly designed site on tuesday that hopes to highlight its best video content.
